name: Wetdog Creative Ltd.
description: We’re Wetdog Creative – a small, friendly graphic design agency based in Cornwall that is mad about branding and all things design. We’re located near Launceston on the Cornwall / Devon border, in easy reach of Plymouth, Tavistock, Exeter and Truro. We work with clients throughout the whole of the South West as well as London, the Cotswolds, home counties and beyond.
